question: 1. Which of the following is NOT a phase of the software development process?
2. What is the purpose of using UML in software development?
options: C. To separate data and operations in structured programming
A. To create abstract representations of software processes
D. To visualize and document software ideas
B. To communicate with customers about software requirements
correct_answer: C. To separate data and operations in structured programming

question: 3. Object diagrams in UML show:
options: A. Interactions between users and the system
D. Relationships among objects in the system
B. Static structure of the system, including classes and objects
C. Dynamic behavior of the system, such as workflows
correct_answer: A. Interactions between users and the system

question: 4. In object-oriented programming, what is the fundamental unit of abstraction?
5. What is the purpose of inheritance in object-oriented programming?
options: C. To separate objects into distinct entities
A. To hide data from other objects
D. To enhance performance of the application
B. To share features between classes
correct_answer: C. To separate objects into distinct entities

question: 6. What does polymorphism allow in object-oriented programming?
options: C. Objects to communicate with each other
D. Operations to be hidden from external objects
A. The same operation to be performed on different data types
B. Objects to inherit features from a base class
correct_answer: C. Objects to communicate with each other

question: 7. Which of the following is an example of a class in UML notation?
1. In UML, what is an operation?
2. What does it mean for an operation to be polymorphic?
options: B) It has the same form in all classes
A) It can only be used in one class
C) It takes different forms in different classes
D) It is not allowed in UML
correct_answer: B) It has the same form in all classes

question: 4. In the context of airlines, what is responsible for running a flight?
5. In a class diagram, what does a dashed line with an arrow indicate?
